shortDescription: Built the official eZpedal production website end-to-end using Next.js and Node.js. Led the migration from a legacy backend to a modern, scalable architecture with MongoDB and Redis. Integrated AWS S3 for secure media storage and optimized delivery. Ensured type safety with TypeScript and deployed a stable, SEO-friendly, and high-performance web presence for the brand.
